edu.yale.its.tp.cas.client.filter
Class WatchfulFilterChain

java.lang.Object
  edu.yale.its.tp.cas.client.filter.WatchfulFilterChain
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.servlet.FilterChain
public class WatchfulFilterChain
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.servlet.FilterChain

A test filter chain which merely records whether and with what arguments its doFilter() method was invoked.

Author:
andrew.petro@yale.edu
